meanings.definition: A highly paid fashion model who has achieved celebrity status and often works for prestigious designers and fashion houses.
meanings.sent1: The supermodels walked confidently down the runway, showcasing the latest designer clothes.
meanings.sent2: Many young girls dream of becoming supermodels and gracing the covers of magazines.
meanings.sent3: The supermodels decided to have a fun photoshoot at the beach, wearing silly hats and oversized sunglasses.
meanings.sent4: In the world of fashion, supermodels are like shining stars that illuminate the catwalk.
meanings.sent5: The supermodels' elegant poses and fierce expressions captivated the audience.

meanings.definition: A person who is considered to be exceptionally attractive and has a successful career in modeling.
meanings.sent1: She was often referred to as the supermodel of her generation due to her stunning looks and successful career.
meanings.sent2: The party was filled with supermodels and celebrities, making it a glamorous event.
meanings.sent3: Even though he was just a regular guy, his friends jokingly called him a supermodel because of his confidence.
meanings.sent4: Her beauty was so striking that people would often stop and stare at her, thinking she must be a supermodel.
meanings.sent5: The supermodel's flawless skin and radiant smile made her the center of attention wherever she went.
